requested"},"balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"params":{"_ids":"ID of the Tokens","_owners":"The addresses of the token holders"},"return":"The _owner's balance of the Token types requested (i.e. balance for each (owner, id) pair)"},"burn(uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"The balance of the _from address must be equal or greater than the amount specified and the _id must belong to a previously created token (approved creation).","params":{"_amount":"The amount of tokens to be burned.","_from":"The address from which the tokens will be burned","_id":"The id of the token to be burned."}},"create(string,address,uint256)":{"params":{"_initialSupply":"The amount of tokens to mint for this new type","_uri":"The URI pointing to the JSON (it must conforms to the \"ERC-1155 Metadata URI JSON Schema\".)"},"return":"The id of the newly created token"},"getTokensWithBalance(address)":{"details":"Looking for better ways to do this, it can change in the future.","params":{"_address":"The address to get the tokens"},"return":"An array containing the ids of the tokens"},"getUnapprovedTokensWithBalance(address)":{"details":"Looking for better ways to do this, it can change in the future.","params":{"_address":"The address to get the tokens"},"return":"An array containing the ids of the tokens yet to be approved."},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"params":{"_operator":"Address of authorized operator","_owner":"The owner of the Tokens"},"return":"True if the operator is approved, false if not"},"isOwner()":{"details":"Returns true if the caller is the current owner."},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see \"Approval\" section of the standard). MUST revert if `_to` is the zero address. MUST revert if length of `_ids` is not the same as length of `_values`. MUST revert if any of the balance(s) of the holder(s) for token(s) in `_ids` is lower than the respective amount(s) in `_values` sent to the recipient. MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit `TransferSingle` or `TransferBatch` event(s) such that all the balance changes are reflected (see \"Safe Transfer Rules\" section of the standard). Balance changes and events MUST follow the ordering of the arrays (_ids[0]/_values[0] before _ids[1]/_values[1], etc). After the above conditions for the transfer(s) in the batch are met, this function MUST check if `_to` is a smart contract (e.g. code size > 0). If so, it MUST call the relevant `ERC1155TokenReceiver` hook(s) on `_to` and act appropriately (see \"Safe Transfer Rules\" section of the standard).","params":{"_data":"Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to the `ERC1155TokenReceiver` hook(s) on `_to`","_from":"Source address","_ids":"IDs of each token type (order and length must match _values array)","_to":"Target address","_values":"Transfer amounts per token type (order and length must match _ids array)"}},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see \"Approval\" section of the standard). MUST revert if `_to` is the zero address. MUST revert if balance of holder for token `_id` is lower than the `_value` sent. MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit the `TransferSingle` event to reflect the balance change (see \"Safe Transfer Rules\" section of the standard). After the above conditions are met, this function MUST check if `_to` is a smart contract (e.g. code size > 0). If so, it MUST call `onERC1155Received` on `_to` and act appropriately (see \"Safe Transfer Rules\" section of the standard).","params":{"_data":"Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to `onERC1155Received` on `_to`","_from":"Source address","_id":"ID of the token type","_to":"Target address","_value":"Transfer amount"}},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"MUST emit the ApprovalForAll event on success.","params":{"_approved":"True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval","_operator":"Address to add to the set of authorized operators"}},"setIActorAddress(address)":{"details":"Only Owner can set the ActorFactory contract, it helps when the Actor Factory migrates","params":{"_actorFactoryAddress":"address of the IActor"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"approveTokenCreation(uint256)":{"notice":"Approves a previously created token to be used. The only user allowed to approve the token creation is the original coffe owner."},"balanceOf(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Get the balance of an account's Tokens."},"balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"notice":"Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs"},"burn(uint256,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Recieves an amount of tokens of a given type to be burned. A token that is burned becomes unusable and it means the sender will receive coffee in return."},"create(string,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Creates the new token for the address in _recipient to approve it. The token cannot be used it until it's approved."},"getTokensWithBalance(address)":{"notice":"Returns an array containing all the ids of the tokens this address has a positive balance and have been approved already. This is intended to be used to show al the tokens available for this address at once without maintaining the ids stored somewhere else."},"getUnapprovedTokensWithBalance(address)":{"notice":"Returns an array containing all the ids of the tokens this account has not yet approved. This is intended to be used to show al the tokens available for this address at once without maintaining the ids stored somewhere else."},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"notice":"Queries the approval status of an operator for a given owner."},"safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"notice":"Transfers `_values` amount(s) of `_ids` from the `_from` address to the `_to` address specified (with safety call)."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Transfers `_value` amount of an `_id` from the `_from` address to the `_to` address specified (with safety call)."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"notice":"Enable or disable approval for a third party (\"operator\") to manage all of the caller's tokens."},"setIActorAddress(address)":{"notice":"Sets the address of the ActorFactory"}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Users/oscarr/Ethereum/wrapped_coffee_coin/contracts/ERC1155.sol":"ERC1155"},"evmVersion":"petersburg","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Users/oscarr/Ethereum/wrapped_coffee_coin/contracts/Address.sol":{"keccak256":"0x016260fe1d6f563acefd8adb335b05e569b4026e3f8d472c3e855412debb83de","urls":["bzzr://57b3995e284ea1abc36b0e96c35585ffd78f46a4a6305c85556b324871dd4350","dweb:/ipfs/QmfLFj4eVtsF3V3LaxyKe6ZaGkwpR8ip1NV44WaHQ3BV1g"]},"/Users/oscarr/Ethereum/wrapped_coffee_coin/contracts/Common.sol":{"keccak256":"0x900d50cdfedbcf60e9e1ef727674ead98b35abf5a01714ed285989d410c01db8","urls":["bzzr://c6231f2dec468ce98e3dcc71c22bceef1ef865ce38bbdb585e927a00de2dafd2","dweb:/ipfs/QmRHVoDnjh7ihKZJCXbsVwMEodGEtKBE1wJcvxqkqec2R2"]},"/Users/oscarr/Ethereum/wrapped_coffee_coin/contracts/ERC1155.sol":{"keccak256":"0x391b2f9c564ee5c1c8365a773a67481160d59d3de812d51e5d168495e0dc0bed","urls":["bzzr://52e33dcff5b34a0624af1de1f19f334c0e3e550e106bfafa4918582d13ccdd05","dweb:/ipfs/QmRwF2dg3xR5ZeD8NZhLYnqdyupBMACaDPicyztMr9bkZG"]},"/Users/oscarr/Ethereum/wrapped_coffee_coin/contracts/ERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x70660c2c79f0ce447bf70065ef2d3762e0e87198879c2f6fbe75f04b25dd1ddd","urls":["bzzr://3448972d834e9d1b070a51c910293f7b5a746e8149823e430ef3743b8972b199","dweb:/ipfs/QmYQAbcWu8jREJg3S2ZqeRNCCp6su2ysqgzDTUYAdrvWfc"]},"/Users/oscarr/Ethereum/wrapped_coffee_coin/contracts/interfaces/IActor.sol":{"keccak256":"0x93adf2cec70c095f7f853e7d494e77c49350c9909eacdd75a6c76a17a0160704","urls":["bzzr://1abe3fe8fcd7805cd2d8f70166685523f43e0fc49d998b2d1fa4834925578dff","dweb:/ipfs/QmXh9uRXQHN1F9wpbGeEyztZMWvBW5AF95yuDCE8LhgCJG"]},"/Users/oscarr/Ethereum/wrapped_coffee_coin/contracts/interfaces/IERC1155.sol":{"keccak256":"0x40071ca890fa2ab810b72dda8e9030026deb69f9c64d236f35d0da7236504187","urls":["bzzr://f7b786807559c8c7060db26b31650908b376293d5db5f3fbc666cc3583832970","dweb:/ipfs/QmNNWLKmdBpZ2A2GRtYqgdmERZKV8iNcR params._id: The id of the token to be approved

params._owner: The address of the token holder

balanceOf(address,uint256).return: The _owner's balance of the Token type requested

params._owners: The addresses of the token holders

burn(uint256,uint256,address).details: The balance of the _from address must be equal or greater than the amount specified and the _id must belong to a previously created token (approved creation).

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be burned.
params._from: The address from which the tokens will be burned
params._id: The id of the token to be burned.

params._initialSupply: The amount of tokens to mint for this new type
params._uri: The URI pointing to the JSON (it must conforms to the "ERC-1155 Metadata URI JSON Schema".)

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.details: Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see "Approval" section of the standard). MUST revert if `_to` is the zero address. MUST revert if length of `_ids` is not the same as length of `_values`. MUST revert if any of the balance(s) of the holder(s) for token(s) in `_ids` is lower than the respective amount(s) in `_values` sent to the recipient. MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit `TransferSingle` or `TransferBatch` event(s) such that all the balance changes are reflected (see "Safe Transfer Rules" section of the standard). Balance changes and events MUST follow the ordering of the arrays (_ids[0]/_values[0] before _ids[1]/_values[1], etc). After the above conditions for the transfer(s) in the batch are met, this function MUST check if `_to` is a smart contract (e.g. code size > 0). If so, it MUST call the relevant `ERC1155TokenReceiver` hook(s) on `_to` and act appropriately (see "Safe Transfer Rules" section of the standard).

params._data: Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to the `ERC1155TokenReceiver` hook(s) on `_to`
params._ids: IDs of each token type (order and length must match _values array)
params._values: Transfer amounts per token type (order and length must match _ids array)

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account (see "Approval" section of the standard). MUST revert if `_to` is the zero address. MUST revert if balance of holder for token `_id` is lower than the `_value` sent. MUST revert on any other error. MUST emit the `TransferSingle` event to reflect the balance change (see "Safe Transfer Rules" section of the standard). After the above conditions are met, this function MUST check if `_to` is a smart contract (e.g. code size > 0). If so, it MUST call `onERC1155Received` on `_to` and act appropriately (see "Safe Transfer Rules" section of the standard).

params._data: Additional data with no specified format, MUST be sent unaltered in call to `onERC1155Received` on `_to`

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: MUST emit the ApprovalForAll event on success.

params._approved: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval
params._operator: Address to add to the set of authorized operators

setIActorAddress(address).details: Only Owner can set the ActorFactory contract, it helps when the Actor Factory migrates

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

approveTokenCreation(uint256).notice: Approves a previously created token to be used. The only user allowed to approve the token creation is the original coffe owner.

balanceOf(address,uint256).notice: Get the balance of an account's Tokens.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).notice: Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs

burn(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Recieves an amount of tokens of a given type to be burned. A token that is burned becomes unusable and it means the sender will receive coffee in return.

create(string,address,uint256).notice: Creates the new token for the address in _recipient to approve it. The token cannot be used it until it's approved.

getTokensWithBalance(address).notice: Returns an array containing all the ids of the tokens this address has a positive balance and have been approved already. This is intended to be used to show al the tokens available for this address at once without maintaining the ids stored somewhere else.

getUnapprovedTokensWithBalance(address).notice: Returns an array containing all the ids of the tokens this account has not yet approved. This is intended to be used to show al the tokens available for this address at once without maintaining the ids stored somewhere else.

isApprovedForAll(address,address).notice: Queries the approval status of an operator for a given owner.

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.notice: Transfers `_values` amount(s) of `_ids` from the `_from` address to the `_to` address specified (with safety call).

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Transfers `_value` amount of an `_id` from the `_from` address to the `_to` address specified (with safety call).

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable approval for a third party ("operator") to manage all of the caller's tokens.

setIActorAddress(address).notice: Sets the address of the ActorFactory
